text: A number of ships have carried the name Great Western. * , built for the Great Western Steamship Company. Sold to Royal Mail Steam Packet Company in 1846. Served as a troopship during the Crimean War and scrapped in 1856. * , built for Ford and Jackson, but used by the Great Western Railway from 1872 to 1890. * , built for the Great Western Railway. Renamed G.W.R. 20 in 1933 and scrapped in 1934. * , built for the Great Western Railway. Scrapped in 1966 by British Rail. Category:Ship names
title: List of ships named SS Great Western
